name: OpenSDG
tagline: Open Source IoT Gateway for Cloud Platform
body:
### What is the OpenSDG.
> OpenSDG = Open Source IoT Gateway Board + Open Gateway Linux
> 
> An open IoT gateway is the one that has its software not dependent on its hardware.

### How it works.
>  OpenSDG is an open IoT gateway for Cloud Platform.

### Getting started with OpenSDG.
